short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extention shows Space picture in background of every new tab!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Transform your browsing experience with the wonders of space directly to your new tabs. Immerse yourself in the beauty and grandeur of the universe as stunning space pictures grace each new tab you open. Explore distant galaxies, awe-inspiring nebulas, and breathtaking celestial phenomena, all at the click of a new tab.

Please note this extension will change your Chrome New Tab and New Tab search. 
New Tab search results powered by Yahoo.

Here are some important details:

By selecting the 'Add to Chrome' button and installing this beautiful 'Space background pictures new tab' you are consenting to the installation of this extension, along with our Privacy Policy and Terms of Service stated below. 
By installing the 'Space background pictures new tab,' you are agreeing to the modification of the new tab settings. 
You have the option to remove or disable this extension whenever you wish. 
Privacy policy available at: https://spacenewtab.com/privacy.html
Terms of Service: https://spacenewtab.com/terms.html

Feel free to contact us at support@spacenewtab.com. We would be delighted to assist you!
